name: Paperplane userbot project
description: A modular Telegram userbot running on Python3, which can be coupled up with Mongo DB and a Redis backend.

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: Get from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'. It's neede for userbot updates.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: Add the Heroku app name here. It's needed for userbot updates.

SCREENSHOT_ACCESS_LAYER_KEY.description: Screenshot Layer API Key for .screenshot command. Get from https://screenshotlayer.com/. Please refer to README for getting the key.

OPEN_WEATHER_MAP_APPID.description: OpenWeather Map API Key for .weather command. Get from https://openweathermap.org/.

BOTLOG.description: In case you want to turn on logging, set this True.

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Chat ID for Botlog. Get it from group management bots such as Rose, or using the .chatid Paperplane command.

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: If you want verbosity on the Logging.

SPOTIPY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify Client ID (API Key). Get from from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard.

SPOTIPY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify Client Secret (API Hash). Get from from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard.

SPOTIPY_SESSION.description: Spotify Session String. Get with scripts/generate_spotify_session.py script.

LASTFM_API.description: API Key for Last.FM module. Get from https://www.last.fm/api/account/create.

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for Last.FM module. Get from https://www.last.fm/api/account/create.

WELCOME_MUTE.description: Detect and mute spambots which match the Paperplane algorithm after they join a group. Use at your own risk, the algorithm is in beta stage.

WOLFRAM_ID.description: Wolfram ID. Get an API KEY from products.wolframalpha.com/api/.
